description:
As a Developer Advocate, you will be passionate about software development, software developers, and everything in between. In this role, you will join the TensorFlow Developer Relations team, working with machine learning technology used to develop virtually all Machine Learning models at Google. You will help us create all TensorFlow documentation and code samples, collaborate with developers on the TensorFlow social channels, create TensorFlow online courses and educational material, and run the entire TensorFlow event strategy, organizing and speaking at events around the world.

In this role, you will engage online companies, universities, and others to help create and deliver TensorFlow and machine learning courses. Additionally, you will collect feedback on the TensorFlow product and collaborate with Engineering to help us shape the future of Machine Learning.

qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Experience in public speaking.
  • Ability to travel nationally and internationally up to 40% of the time as required.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Experience developing and teaching technical subjects at educational institutions.
  • Experience creating massively open online courses (MOOCs).
  • Experience organizing and running communities and meet-ups.
  • Passion to learn and educate others on Machine Learning and TensorFlow.
  • Demonstrated technical and software development skills.
responsibilities:
• Engage online companies, universities, and others to help create and deliver TensorFlow and Machine Learning courses worldwide.
  • Work closely with the Engineering and Product teams to help design, launch, and support developer features.
title: Developer Advocate, TensorFlow Education
